text: That little beast, Robbie Munyard!" Having said her say Peggy manfully shouldered her burden and prepared to break up yet another home. In the ten years of married life this had already happened half a dozen times. Such is the life of a naval officer's wife.
handwritten_text: That little beast, Robbie Munyard!" Having said her say Peggy manfully shouldered her burden and prepared to break up yet another home. In the ten years of married life this had already happened half a dozen times. Such is the life of a naval officer's wife.
